attributes.action: Award George Michael an OBE for his services to Music & Charity
attributes.background: After his passing, it has come to our knowledge that George Michael was very very generous to charities, combine that with his musical achievements he should be awarded an OBE

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours

However, at the moment it is not possible for honours to be awarded posthumously. You may wish to sign this petition if you want honours to be awarded posthumously: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/165507
